modelView:
{
      "type": "page",
      "name": "EmployeePage",
      "title": "Employ Details page",
      "components": [
            {
                  "type": "resource",
                  "name": "Empdept",
                  "binding": "rest",
                  "resource": "virtualDomains.empdept"
            },
            {
                  "type": "resource",
                  "name": "Dept",
                  "binding": "rest",
                  "resource": "virtualDomains.department"
            },
            {
                  "type": "form",
                  "name": "SelectDepartment",
                  "label": "Filter",
                  "components": [
                        {
                              "type": "select",
                              "name": "SelectDept",
                              "label": "Department",
                              "sourceModel": "Dept",
                              "labelKey": "DNAME",
                              "valueKey": "DEPTNO",
                              "sourceParameters": {},
                              "sourceValue": [],
                              "required": false,
                              "value": "",
                              "placeholder": "All Departments",
                              "loadInitially": true,
                              "onUpdate": "$EmployeeDetails.$load()"
                        }
                  ],
                  "nextButtonLabel": "Next",
                  "showInitially": true
            },
            {
                  "type": "form",
                  "name": "EditEmpList",
                  "label": "Edit Employees",
                  "components": [
                        {
                              "type": "grid",
                              "model": "Empdept",
                              "parameters": {
                                    "DEPTNO": "$SelectDept"
                              },
                              "name": "EmployeeDetails",
                              "allowNew": true,
                              "allowModify": true,
                              "allowReload": true,
                              "allowDelete": true,
                              "pageSize": 8,
                              "components": [
                                    {
                                          "type": "display",
                                          "model": "id",
                                          "label": "Id",
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "asHtml": false
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "EMPNO",
                                          "type": "number",
                                          "label": "Employee Number",
                                          "model": "EMPNO",
                                          "required": false,
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "validation": {}
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "type": "text",
                                          "model": "ENAME",
                                          "label": "Employee Name",
                                          "required": false,
                                          "name": "ENAME",
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "SEX",
                                          "type": "select",
                                          "labelKey": "desc",
                                          "valueKey": "sex",
                                          "label": "Gender",
                                          "sourceModel": "",
                                          "sourceParameters": {},
                                          "sourceValue": [
                                                {
                                                      "sex": "M",
                                                      "desc": "Male"
                                                },
                                                {
                                                      "sex": "F",
                                                      "desc": "Female"
                                                }
                                          ],
                                          "model": "SEX",
                                          "required": false,
                                          "placeholder": "Choose Sex",
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "type": "select",
                                          "model": "DEPTNO",
                                          "label": "Department Name",
                                          "sourceModel": "Dept",
                                          "labelKey": "DNAME",
                                          "valueKey": "DEPTNO",
                                          "sourceParameters": {},
                                          "sourceValue": [],
                                          "required": false,
                                          "name": "DEPTNO",
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "SAL",
                                          "type": "number",
                                          "label": "Salary",
                                          "model": "SAL",
                                          "required": false,
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "validation": {},
                                          "parameters": {},
                                          "fractionDigits": 2
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "COMM",
                                          "type": "number",
                                          "label": "Commission",
                                          "model": "COMM",
                                          "placeholder": "Enter",
                                          "required": false,
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "validation": {},
                                          "parameters": {},
                                          "fractionDigits": 2
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "TOTAL",
                                          "type": "literal",
                                          "value": "{{item.SAL + item.COMM | number:2}}",
                                          "label": "Total Payment",
                                          "style": "text-align: right;"
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "type": "datetime",
                                          "model": "HIREDATE",
                                          "label": "Hire Date",
                                          "required": false,
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "parameters": {},
                                          "validation": {},
                                          "readonly": false,
                                          "name": "HIREDATE"
                                    }
                              ],
                              "onClick": "console.log(\"selected record: \"+currentSelection.id);\nconsole.log('clicked'+$EmployeeDetailsDS.$currentRecord);",
                              "loadInitially": true,
                              "label": "Employee Grid label",
                              "newRecordLabel": "",
                              "refreshDataLabel": ""
                        }
                  ],
                  "nextButtonLabel": "Next",
                  "showInitially": true
            },
            {
                  "name": "SelectedEmployee",
                  "type": "form",
                  "label": "",
                  "nextButtonLabel": "",
                  "showInitially": true,
                  "components": [
                        {
                              "name": "GridSelection",
                              "type": "literal",
                              "label": "Selected Record Raw Data:",
                              "value": "$EmployeeDetailsDS.selectedRecords"
                        }
                  ]
            }
      ],
      "scriptingLanguage": "JavaScript"
}
